name: FLY OZ PTY LTD
about: FLY OZ PTY LTD, established in 2013, is a premier flying school dedicated to advanced pilot training. Based at Louise M. Thaden Field in Bentonville, Arkansas, and with operations in Australia, FLY OZ creates a warm and supportive educational atmosphere for its students. The school offers a Diploma of Aviation (Commercial Pilot Licence - Aeroplane) with options for online delivery, subsidies, apprenticeships, and VET student loans. FLY OZ combines a network of airstrips with a flying club, focusing on recreational and backcountry flying, and provides a comprehensive range of services including flight training, scenic flights, and FAA knowledge testing. With a commitment to safety and respect for the aviation community, FLY OZ is your gateway to aerial adventures and a gathering place for all who love aviation.
services:
["Flight Simulator
Recreational Pilot Licence Course
Private Pilot Licence Course
Advanced Flight Training
Aviation and IREX Theory Course"]
